did.unittitle: James Branch Cabell, Dumbarton, Virginia, to the Editors of Who's Who in America

scopecontent.p: [Having just learned that the biography sent to him for revision was inadvertently destroyed and never reached him, he offers to bring it up to date if they will send another; the recipient has written on the letter "has been passed -owed for 10-11 -Daniels gave up trying to collect."]

did.unittitle: James Branch CabellAutobiographical Sketch for Who's Who in America, 1942-1943 edition, with additional information typed by Cabell on the form and signed by him
